summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Calhoun Street, from the existing sewer west of 22nd Avenue North to 19th Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6722, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
